trends: There has been one other sighting in plains
There were no other sightings in plains on or around April 2nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving along hwy 15 about 10pm just outside of Plains Georgia I noticed 3 diamond shaped objects pulsating in the SE sky. I observed the lights about 15 min.I pulled over and took several photos of what appears to be round hard ball shape objects. I drove on searching for them and they had vanished! The pics will be available to view hopefully by tomorrow
Summary: diamond shapes 3 pulsating white green red and at times bright white also as a plane approached it went black as the plane passed the lights came back on
